beers.name: 1MPH
beers.description: An American Pale Ale featuring vibrant tropical and citrus aromas from the addition of Citra Hops.

beers.name: APOCALYPSE MEOW MEOW
beers.description: A Golden Ale with Metric Coffee, Raspberries, & Vanilla.

beers.name: ARROZ BY ANY OTHER NAME
beers.description: We used a blend of rice, including jasmine to lighten the body, add crispness and snap, as well as impart a delicate flavor to this clean lager. Very light in color, and balanced, with rounded malt, and herbal hop notes throughout.

beers.name: AZACCA MORRIS
beers.description: Azacca Hops are the main protagonist of Azacca Morris IPA. With intense tropical aromas and flavored, Azacca Morris is a charming schemer who demonstrates a flair for citrus and very ripe mango, with notes of orchard fruit (pears, apples) and pine needles throughout.

beers.name: AZACCS MORRIS
beers.description: Azacca hops are the main protagonist of Azacca Morris IPA. With intense tropical aromas and flavors, Azacca Morris is a charming schemer who demonstrates a flair for citrus and very ripe mango, with notes of orchard fruit and pine needles throughout.

beers.name: BARREL AGED BARELY BUTCHER
beers.description: We took a portion of barleywine aged in bourbon & rye barrels, and blended in a small amount of imperial stout base that was aged in Madeira barrels.

beers.name: BARREL AGED COFFEE MIND FK
beers.description: Imperial Stout aged for 12 months in a freshly dumped Eagle Rare barrel with Metric Fulton Street coffee, vanilla beans and cacao nibs.

beers.name: BAVARIAN DREAM
beers.description: It's a Hefe! Notes of clove and banana; effervescent and quenching.

beers.name: BELLE LA VIE
beers.description: A light and drinkable Belgian Style Single.

beers.name: BELLE MONDE
beers.description: Our traditional Tripel-style golden ale is brewed with the highest quality European malt and our favorite Belgian yeast strain.

beers.name: BENDED SEA
beers.description: This Baltic Porter has a silky mouthfeel and big roasty chocolate notes. It's complex and rich and a perfect sipper for the colder season.

beers.name: BERLINER BLANC
beers.description: Dry-hopped Berliner Weisse.

beers.name: BIG PULPY
beers.description: This DIPA drinks like juice with insane amounts of hop aroma and flavor.

beers.name: BLACK SAISON
beers.description: A non-traditional saison brewed with malts more typical of a porter. The darker malt results in a rich flavor profile with notes of roasted barley and plums complimented by hints of citrus and spice from our yeast. We finish the beer by lightly dry hopping with Northern Brewer and Columbus hops. The resulting liquid is a new take on a farmhouse ale

beers.name: BOCK IN THE GROOVE
beers.description: A traditional style bock beer brewed with a blend of the finest German malts. Dark amber

beers.name: BOHEMIAN RYE-CITY
beers.description: A smoked rye pilsner.

beers.name: BREAKFAST AT LUCIFERS
beers.description: We teamed up with 18th Street Brewing Co. and brewed a DIPA with blueberry and coffee. Big notes of fruit and coffee beans hit with a creamy mouthfeel; this is a strangely balanced beer.

beers.name: BROWNIE POINTS
beers.description: Full of malty chocolate and toffee flavors, Brownie Points has a creamy body from the addition of flaked oats.

beers.name: CASHMERE PANTS
beers.description: American pale ale w/ lactose & oats, truly showcasing the Cashmere hops, but there's a kiss of Cascade on the back end. Fairly hazy.

beers.name: CASHMERE PULASKI
beers.description: This variation on our dearest Pilsner is brewed annually for our Pulaski Day celebrations.

beers.name: CHARLATAN
beers.description: An American Pale Ale generously hopped with Citra, Centennial, and Simcoe hops for fresh citrus flavors with mild earthy pine notes.

beers.name: CHINOOK IMPERIAL RED
beers.description: Imperial Red Ale brewed with Chinook hops

beers.name: CLOSER THAN WE THINK
beers.description: Double India Pale Ale brewed with Simcoe hops and Simcoe Dynaboost, an extract that enhances all the juicy stone fruit, and tropical notes of Simcoe. Double dry-hopped with Elani hops, which pair insanely well, adding more peach flavor and pineapple aroma.

beers.name: COAST RIDER
beers.description: Brewed with the finest pilsner malt and Citra hops, this west coast interpretation of a Pilsner is refreshing and flavorful. A simple recipe results in balance, with big notes of citrus zest, and crusty, malty bread.

beers.name: COLLIDING CANOPIES
beers.description: A Northeast style Double IPA brewed Citra, Riwaka, and Motueka Cryo hops. Popping with overripe tropical notes and hints of grapefruit, grape juice and gooseberries.

beers.name: COOL AUGUST MOON
beers.description: Foeder aged honey saison with wine grapes.

beers.name: CORN TO BE WILD
beers.description: We use Eclipse, Citra, and Motueka hops in heavy doses throughout the brewing process, so this west coaster has tons of orange, and tangerine peel, with notes of pine and tropical fruit.

beers.name: COSMIC ROCKS
beers.description: This low ABV wheat ale has bright notes of citrus and a tart finish that refreshes your palette for the next sip...and the next...and the next....and the, well you get the idea. It's delicious!

beers.name: CREEPY GINGER
beers.description: Brewed to celebrate one of the red-headed founders of Maplewood Brewing Company, the Creepy Ginger is a Belgian-Style Golden Strong Ale brewed with a pilsner malt base and a healthy amount of spelt. A modest amount of organic ginger root is infused after fermentation to add subtle complexity to classic Belgian fruity and spicy flavors, resulting in a unique and refreshing Belgian-style ale.

beers.name: CRUSHINATOR
beers.description: This easy-drinking IPA uses a base of Vienna malt and ﬂaked maize to create great depth in a low ABV beer.

beers.name: DAGGERTOOTH
beers.description: A balanced IPA that looks like a stout but still drinks like an IPA.

beers.name: DEM GUAVA BOYS
beers.description: Our Berliner Weisse is brewed with an heirloom variety pilsner malt from Germany and the finest American grown wheat. The malts we chose impart a rich and grainy base which is married with the refreshing tartness achieved by kettle souring with a blend of Lactobacillus.

beers.name: DISTANT ARROW
beers.description: Distant Arrow is a crisp American Wheat Ale with a bright citrus hop profile, perfect for a warm Chicago day...OR night...OR morning...OR whenever

beers.name: DOOMBUGGY
beers.description: We double dry hopped with Vic Secret and Citra hops resulting in huge tropical notes of pineapple and passionfruit with hints of dank pine.

beers.name: DOUBLE CHARLATAN
beers.description: A Double dry hopped Double IPA brewed with Citra, Centennial, Columbus & Amarillo hops. It’s our award winning pale ale but kicked up a notch. Big peach, citrus and tropical notes.

beers.name: DR. JUICENSTEIN
beers.description: A modest grain bill of pale pilsner and wheat malts with a grandiose hop bill of lupulin powder from Simcoe, Citra and Mosaic hops BUT that's not it, we also added pure hop extract from mosaic hops. The Dr. is brimming with such vivid tropical flavor and aroma the first sip will drive you to brink of insanity!

beers.name: DRINK DAT CITRA
beers.description: DDH Citra IPA w/ citra hops, citra cryo and citra terpine

beers.name: DRINK DAT MOSAIC
beers.description: DDH IPA focusing on the Mosaic hop.

beers.name: DRIPPING CITRA
beers.description: This is our juicy love letter to Citra hops.

beers.name: ELLA OPAL
beers.description: A hint of tart with flavors of rustic wheat & lemon. Mango balances out the bite on the finish.

beers.name: FAT PUG
beers.description: With welcoming notes of dark chocolate and coffee, this Milk Stout combines a variety of roasted grains to produce a complex yet mellow flavor.

beers.name: FEAR STALKS THE LAND
beers.description: Our newest Hazy, brewed with CGX Strata, Sabro Cryo, Sabro and Idaho 7 hops. It boasts tropical flavors of coconut, pineapple and tangerine sitting on big notes of dankness.

beers.name: FESTBIER
beers.description: Brewed with the finest German malts and noble hops!

beers.name: FLASHES OF LIGHT
beers.description: Brewed with the finest Bohemian pilsner malt and Czech-grown Saaz hops.

beers.name: FLUFFY BOTTOMS
beers.description: Expect bright citrus notes, with waves of mango, papaya, guava & fruit punch. (Motueka and Cashmere hops)

beers.name: FOEDER CHERRY APOCALYPSE
beers.description: Mixed culture cherry beer, foeder aged, with lactose and vanilla, conditioned on single origin Peruvian coffee beans.

beers.name: FOGEY'S ESB
beers.description: Our brewers strive to brew the perfect balance of malt and hop with this style, resulting in a drinkable beer with the rich malt flavors of honey, and fresh baked bread nuanced with the complex citrus, and herbal spice notes of the hops.

beers.name: GOBY
beers.description: A light and insanely refreshing tart ale overflowing with tropical juiciness! Crisp and dry, but balanced by the addition of pineapple, orange, and guava.

beers.name: GOLDEN COLDIE
beers.description: A golden India Pale Lager.

beers.name: GREEN CREST
beers.description: Citrus punch, with notes of apricot, and juicy peach are presented in a golden, crisp, and medium bodied IPA.

beers.name: GUATAMALAN BAM BAM
beers.description: American Brown Ale With Coffee.

beers.name: HERITAGE CHARLATAN
beers.description: A unique American Pale Ale with English malt character. Charlatan is generously hopped with Simcoe, Citra, and Centennial hops. Charlatan has fresh citrus and tropical flavors (mango, passion fruit, grapefruit). You might also pick up some earthy pine notes from the Simcoe. Low co-humulone bittering hops provide a smooth bitterness that balances Charlatan’s round malt backbone to create an extremely drinkable pale ale.

beers.name: HIGHS AND MIDS
beers.description: Double India Pale Ale brewed and double dry-hopped with Strata, Citra, Columbus, and Ekuanot hops. This is a dank and sticky hazy with overripe tropical notes that has hints of pine forest and herb.

beers.name: HOP FRIED RICE
beers.description: A collaboration beer with Transient Artisan Ales brewed with rice and hopped at heavy levels with Hopsteiner hops Lotus and Experimental 09326.

beers.name: HOP TOPIC
beers.description: A West Coast IPA brewed with a simplified grain bill of 2-row barley and carapils.

beers.name: HUSKY PANTS
beers.description: This fat older brother to Juice Pants pours hazy and has huge notes of tropical fruit with some dankness. You're going to have to work up a husky thirst for this big ol' boy. Hops: Sultana, Idaho 7, Citra, Columbus

beers.name: IN DARK TREES
beers.description: A lightly roasted dark lager with notes of toasted barley and spicy hops.

beers.name: IT MIGHT BE, IT COULD BE, IT IS
JUICE JORTS
beers.description: Juicy pale ale double dry hopped with Citra & Azacca and El Dorado hops.

beers.name: JUICE PANTS
beers.description: Juice Pants is a healthily hopped hazy IPA showcasing both Citra hops & cryo, as well as Mosaic hops & cryo.

beers.name: KELL EM ALL
beers.description: Brewed with the 100% German grown Pilsner malt and hopped lightly with Slovenian grown hops; Styrian Golding and the slightly fruitier Styrian Wolf. This beer should be slammed. Responsibly.

beers.name: KELLERFORNIA LOVE
beers.description: Brewed with a base of German floor malted pilsner malt and good ol' West Coast grown Citra hops; this German lager is bright and has notes of citrus zest smothered in honey with hints of tropical fruit peaking in. Easy drinking and complex at the same time.

beers.name: KRÖMPUS
beers.description: Porter brewed with rum and vanilla bean.

beers.name: LIL GRIZ AND THE BOYZ
beers.description: Barrel fermented Grisette aged in neutral American oak barrels

beers.name: LOGAN IS FOR LOVERS
beers.description: Our new neighbors came a-knockin' for some lovin' and of course we said, yes! This intensely tropical collab with Middlebrow drinks like everyone's favorite childhood bev: Hawaiian Punch. Featuring Middlebrow's house yeast blend, Denali & Mosaic hops, and a medley of real Passion Fruit, Mango, Pink Guava, and Pineapple, one sip will transport your mind to the summers of yesteryear.

beers.name: LOUNGE LAGER
beers.description: American Adjunct Lager brewed with 6-Row Barley and flaked corn showcasing malty undertones with a refreshing noble hop bite.

beers.name: MANDARINA BAVARIA
beers.description: An honest reward for an honest day's work. Grain: Pilsner, Spelt, Abbey, and Melanoidin. Hops: Mandarina Bavaria, Mt. Hood, and Warrior.

beers.name: MANGOES ON MAIN
beers.description: A pale ale full of juicy dank citrus flavor, dosed with mangos to take this pale ale from the festival straight into summer

beers.name: MARGARITA GOSE
beers.description: A German style wheat beer that was soured with a special Lactobacillus blend and brewed with lime peel, orange peel and sea salt. Spelt was used to impart a nutty flavor that compliments the bread-like qualities from the malt/wheat. A lightly tart ale with a crisp and refreshing flavor reminiscent of a margarita on the rocks with a salted rim

beers.name: MEGA DRY
beers.description: This baby drinks and tastes like a sparkling white wine, super dry, spritzy, super refreshing. Introducing our Brut IPA collab with Omega Yeast Labs - Maplewood Mega Dry. We fermented it with Omega’s exclusive Voss Kveik strain for extra sex appeal.

beers.name: MEGA DRY BRUT ROSÉ
beers.description: The rosé variant on our Mega Dry series focuses on the red wine notes imparted from the addition of black currant juxtaposed with the white wine notes from a dry hop of Nelson Sauvin and some Galaxy terps

beers.name: MELTING MOSAIC
beers.description: Our juicy love letter to Mosaic hops is double dry hopped with a hefty amount.

beers.name: METHODE HAZE
beers.description: Double IPA double dry hopped with Citra and Meridian hops. A tropical juice bomb!

beers.name: MIKHAIL GORBACHEV
beers.description: Fair trade rooibos tea, ginger, beetroot, whole cloves, coriander, cardamom, cinnomon, almond and Aplles.

beers.name: MIND FK
beers.description: Tea infused Russian Imperial Stout (black tea with coconut and cocoa nibs)

beers.name: MOON FRUIT
beers.description: A luscious double dry hopped DIPA brewed with Galaxy, Citra and Mosaic hops.

beers.name: MY COUSIN BINNY VOL. 3
beers.description: We used insanely juicy cuts of Riwaka, Motueka, and Wai-iti hops to make for a tropical DIPA with notes of grapefruit zest, orange pulp, papaya and passionfruit.

beers.name: NELSON SAUVIN JUICE PANTS
beers.description: Juice Pants has been bombarded with hops once again and this time there's a lot of Nelson Sauvin!

beers.name: ORANGE CRUSHINATOR
beers.description: Session IPA with blood orange and vanilla beans

beers.name: PANIC! AT THE RODEO
beers.description: The yeast biotransforms thiol precursors from the malt and hops, and generates notes of passionfruit and guava on top of the malt driven lager with lovely notes of lemon and lime.

beers.name: PAULIE CHOCOLATES
beers.description: Cacoa Nib filtered Imperial Milk Stout.

beers.name: PULASKI PILS
beers.description: Classic meets Chicago in our Pulaski Pils.

beers.name: RADIO SILENCE
beers.description: Expect sticky notes of citrus covered pine with hints of stone fruit and honey slathered toast. With each sip, embrace the silence and let the flavors speak for themselves.

beers.name: RIPE DREAM
beers.description: Brewed and double dry hopped with Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin and Columbus hops this IPA is dripping with notes of ripe tropical fruit!

beers.name: RIWAKA'N ON SUNSHINE
beers.description: Our juicy expression of NZ grown Riwaka hops.

beers.name: SANTA SANGRE
beers.description: A tart Belgian style ale brewed with pilsner and spelt and fermented in a neutral oak barrel using a mixed culture. Aged for two years.

beers.name: SIDEWALK SURFER
beers.description: West Coast style IPA brewed with hand selected Strata (Indie Hops), Mosaic, and Citra hops.

beers.name: SILVER MORNING
beers.description: A malty and robust Doppelbock Lager brewed with rich malts and noble hops.

beers.name: SIMPLICITY IS BLISS
beers.description: Complex and elegant with notes of fudge, and fresh roasted coffee beans, with big waves of vanilla that were complimented by and addition of Tanzanian vanilla beans.

beers.name: SNEAKERBEAST
beers.description: A light and easy drinking West Coast style pale ale brewed with british pale malt, wheat and a dash of honey malt.

beers.name: SON OF JUICE
beers.description: Bursting with notes of tropical fruit, Son of Juice features loads of Mosaic, Mosaic Cryo, Simcoe, Simcoe Cryo, and Nugget hops.

beers.name: SON OF SHAKEY
beers.description: Brewed with wheat, oats, and lactose for that thick and creamy body you've come to expect from the Shakey surname.

beers.name: SOUTH OF PASSION
beers.description: This juice bomb is loaded with Southern Passion hops from South Africa and a bit of good ol' American Mosaic for good measure.

beers.name: SPRUCETTE
beers.description: A Belgian style table beer brewed with a large portion of rye which lends body and spice. This beer was conditioned on Colorado grown hand picked spruce tips which add a woodsy character and depth to the fruit and spice notes from the yeast and malt/rye.

beers.name: STA
beers.description: Our juicy, double dry hopped love letter to Sabro hops.

beers.name: STEAMLESS IN CHICAGO
beers.description: A collaboration with our friends St. Errant Brewing couldn't be normal, so unlike almost all traditional beer, this DIPA is not boiled prior to fermentation. This allows for more proteins to reach the final beer, which results in ax extra lush and silky mouthfeel. Double dry-hopped with Citra cryo, Mosaic cryo, Amarillo cryo, and some Galaxy for good measure, expect huge tropical and citrusy hop flavor and aroma. HUUUGE!!

beers.name: SUPER SON OF JUICE
beers.description: We took our hazy baby and practically doubled everything. It's busting at the seams with juicy notes of citrus, pineapple, and mango!

beers.name: THE CHANTELAIN
beers.description: Inspired by Paulie at Monk's Pub Chicago

beers.name: THE CHILL AIR
beers.description: A traditional Vienna-style lager brewed with rich German malts.

beers.name: THE KINGS ENGLISH
beers.description: We used the finest Maris Otter malt and hops that the UK could provide which resulted in a golden hued ale with layers of malt flavor and subtle hop spice.

beers.name: THE ROYAL TANNENBAUM
beers.description: Our jolly red IPA, brewed with dark and toasty malt and hopped with Citra, Chinook and Cascade Cryo.

beers.name: THE SOUND
beers.type: West Coast Style India Pale Ale
beers.description: Hopped with Simcoe, Centennial, Chinook, and Amarillo Cryo. Brewed with malt and hops both grown near the West Coast. This IPA is bright and citrusy with hints of pine and resin.

beers.name: THE WILHELM
beers.description: A modern Cream Ale brewed with oats and lightly dry-hopped with Cascade and Motueka hops.

beers.name: THREAT LEVEL SIMCOE
beers.description: A hazy IPA brewed and dry hopped with a dangerous level of simcoe hops. Simcoe pellets were used in tandem with cryo powder and isolated terpenes. An amazing expression of one of our favorite hops!

beers.name: TIGER MOUNTAIN
beers.description: A traditional style Helles brewed with high quality heritage malt from Germany and noble hops.

beers.name: TOP POCKET
beers.description: Our light and refreshing blonde ale is brewed with honey malt to add some golden-hued sweetness

beers.name: TROPICAMO
beers.description: A hazy IPA brewed and double dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin, Citra and Azacca hops.

beers.name: UNBREAKABLE PACTS: WOLFHOLD
beers.description: Our collaboration with Solemn Oath is a drinkable stout at a reasonable ABV. We designed the recipe around the concept of blending in 20% barrel aged stout.

beers.name: VIENNA LAGER
beers.description: Unfiltered lager.

beers.name: WALLABREEZY
beers.description: Our hazy love letter to Southern Hemisphere hops. Double dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin, Moteuka, Galaxy and Rakau.

beers.name: WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU KUMQUATS
beers.description: A Saison with lemony sorrel and pink peppercorns, then racked onto kumquats and pomelo! Citrus, Spice, and Belgian Goodness.

beers.name: WILD IDAHO NIGHTS
beers.description: A hazy IPA brewed and double dry hopped with Citra and Idaho 7 hops.

beers.name: WILLO
beers.description: Belgian-style wheat ale brewed with barley, flaked wheat, malted and unmalted wheat.

beers.name: WOKEBERRIES
beers.description: Golden ale brewed with Metric coffee, raspberries, and vanilla.

beers.name: WORLD OUTSIDE
beers.description: A well balanced porter that has big notes of caramel and chocolate, with hints of coffee and toasted malt throughout.

beers.name: ZERO FOX
beers.description: Copper IPA.
